name: Airtime Infinity
description:
Controls: Hold space to charge up attack, and release space to unleash the attack. No WASD movement (may implement movement in the air when adding enemy attacks if that ever gets added).

If playing in browser, full screen for better experience.

Credits: Everything except music/sounds was made by me. Lots of googling images for reference/inspiration was involved. BGM is "It Has To Be This Way" from Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance. Sound effects are found off google.
